text: The 2013–14 season of the NOFV-Oberliga was the sixth season of the league at tier five (V) of the German football league system. The NOFV-Oberliga was split into two divisions, the NOFV-Oberliga Nord and the NOFV-Oberliga Süd. == 2012–13 NOFV-Oberliga Nord == VSG Altglienicke withdrew at the end of the season. == 2012–13 NOFV-Oberliga Süd == == References == == External links == * NOFV-Online – official website of the North-East German Football Association Category:NOFV-Oberliga seasons NOFV
title: 2013–14 NOFV-Oberliga
